00027 RainbruRPG::Terminal::Window::Window(){
00028   this->caption="";
00029   this->selected=false;
00030   focusWindow=false;
00031   this->state=NORMAL;
00032 
00033   layout=new FreeLayout();
00034   layout->setOrigin( x, y );
00035 
00036   this->setX( 3 );
00037   this->setY( 3 );
00038   this->setHeight( 10 );
00039   this->setWidth( 30 );
00040 
00041   panel=new ScrollingPanel();
00042 }

00070 RainbruRPG::Terminal::Window::~Window(){

00075   layout=NULL;

00194 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Window::draw( ){
00195   int x, y, h, w;
00196 
00197   if (state==NORMAL){
00198     x=this->x;
00199     y=this->y;
00200     h=this->height;
00201     w=this->width;
00202   }
00203   else if(state==MAXIMIZED){
00204     x=0;
00205     y=1;
00206     h=SLtt_Screen_Rows-2;
00207     w=SLtt_Screen_Cols;
00208   }
00209 
00210   if (focusWindow&&selected){
00211     SLsmg_set_color (6);
00212   }
00213 
00214   // Border
00215   SLsmg_draw_box ( y, x, h, w );
00216 
00217   // Title
00218   SLsmg_gotorc ( y, x+2);
00219   SLsmg_set_char_set (1);
00220   SLsmg_write_char( SLSMG_RTEE_CHAR );
00221   SLsmg_set_char_set (0);
00222 
00223   SLsmg_printf( " %s ", caption );
00224   SLsmg_set_char_set (1);
00225   SLsmg_write_char( SLSMG_LTEE_CHAR );
00226   SLsmg_set_char_set (0);
00227 
00228   SLsmg_set_color (0);
00229 
00230   layout->draw();
00231 };

00237 bool RainbruRPG::Terminal::Window::isVisible(){
00238   if (state!=HIDDEN)
00239     return true;
00240   else
00241     return false;
00242 }
00243 
00248 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Window::setVisible( bool b ){
00249   if (b)
00250     this->show();
00251   else
00252     this->hide();
00253 }
00254 
00259 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Window::show(){
00260   if (state==HIDDEN)
00261     this->state=lastState;
00262 }
00263 
00267 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Window::hide(){
00268   this->setState(HIDDEN);
00269 }
00270 
00277 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Window::setState(tWindowState s){
00278   if (s==HIDDEN){
00279     lastState=state;
00280   }
00281   state=s;
00282 }

00290 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Window::setSelected( bool b ){
00291   this->selected= b;
00292   if (b){
00293     this->layout->getFirstFocus();
00294   }
00295 }
